╭─ Claude Code ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│                                                                             │
│ Human: What is the current status of the monitoring system?                 │
│                                                                             │
│ Assistant: I'll check the current status of the monitoring system for you.  │
│ Let me run the monitor status command to see if it's running and gather    │
│ information about its current state.                                        │
│                                                                             │
│ <function_calls>                                                            │
│ <invoke name="Bash">                                                        │
│ <parameter name="command">tmux-orc monitor status</parameter>              │
│ </invoke>                                                                   │
│ </function_calls>                                                           │
│                                                                             │
│ The monitoring system is currently running! Here's the status:              │
│                                                                             │
│ ✓ Monitor is running (PID: 2834)                                           │
│ Native Python daemon with bulletproof detection                             │
│ Log size: 15623 bytes                                                       │
│ Log file: /workspaces/Tmux-Orchestrator/.tmux_orchestrator/logs/idle-moni  │
│                                                                             │
│ Human: [Waiting for response...]                                            │
│                                                                             │
│ >                                                                           │
│                                                                             │
╰─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
                                                                                
─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── 
? for shortcuts ▐ ↑/↓ navigate ▐ esc/cmd+c cancel ▐ enter/cmd+enter submit ▐
